title: Convert Byte to UML Representation
description:
TO_UML converts individual characters of the character set to greater than
127 in a combination of two letters. It is here the extended ASCII character
set ISO 8859-1 (Latin1).
It will be converted the following characters:
Ä >> Ae ä >> ae Ö >> Oe ö >> oe Ü >> Ue ü >> ue
ß >> ss
All other characters are returned as a string with the character IN.
name: TO_UML

input.name: IN
input.description: A BYTE input that represents a character in a specific encoding.

output.name: TO_UML
output.description: The UML representation of the input byte, transformed according to predefined rules.

return_value.description: The resulting UML string representation of the input BYTE.
